data_footnotes:
Objectives: Proportion of project objectives of new development interventions drawn from country-led result frameworks.
• Indicators: Proportion of results indicators drawn from country-led results frameworks.
• Data: Proportion of results indicators which will be monitored using government sources and monitoring systems.
• Data is only available from 2016.
